pic1_alt: Bar chart of number of refugees and other people in need of international protection, by country of origin, at the end of 2022. Syrian Arab Rep. 6,547,818. Ukraine 5,679,880. Afghanistan 5,661,675. Venezuela (Bolivarian Republic of) 5,451,832. South Sudan 2,294,983. Myanmar 1,253,111. Dem. Rep. of the Congo 931,903. Sudan 836,756. Somalia 790,513. Central African Rep. 748,327. Source UNHCR Refugee Data Finder.
pic2_alt: Demographics of populations protected and/or assisted by UNHCR in 2022 by age. 60+ 3% male, 4% female. 18-59 25% male, 27% female. 0-17 21% male, 21% female. Note: age and sex disggregated data is not available for all countries of asylum. Figures do not add up to 100% due to rounding. Source UNHCR Refugee Data Finder.
